entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
